author: cmpilato
msg: * libsvn_fs/dag.c
(svn_fs__dag_dup): Bug fix.  Make sure we copy the node kind over when we
dup.

author: fitz
msg: *cl.h: added message member to svn_cl__opt_state_t struct
*commit-cmd.c: pass opt_state->message down to
svn_client_commit. Remove stale comments
*main.c: - alphabetize options[],
- add --message 'm' option
- add case for message arg
*tests/svn-test2.sh: added --message to final commit test.
So now messages are getting passed down to the nether regions of the
client libs, but I don't see (from the test) that the message is
finding its way into the xml file generated by the commit. Poked
around a little in libsvn_ra, but decided that sleep was a better
option at this point.

author: fitz
msg: The true Southern watermelon is a boon apart, and not to be mentioned with
commoner things.  It is chief of the world's luxuries, king by the grace of God
over all the fruits of the earth.  When one has tasted it, he knows what the
angels eat.  It was not a Southern watermelon that Eve took; we know it because
she repented.
-- Mark Twain

author: fitz
msg: - Tweaked some comments and misc cleanup
- Implemented method to grab all non-file args (using -1)

author: kfogel
msg: (svn_fs_commit_txn): Check error from commit attempt better.
